/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is lined with lush green trees, providing a stark contrast to the clear blue sky above. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the street, their facades hinting at the architectural diversity of the city. Cars and motorcycles, parked and in motion, add a dynamic element to the scene. The image is bathed in the warm glow of a sunny day, casting long shadows and highlighting the textures of the cityscape.
